26/* This file contains wrappers for the system allocation routines. Most
27 places in the OpenMP API do not make any provision for failure, so in
28 general we cannot allow memory allocation to fail. */
29
30#include "libgomp.h"
31#include <stdlib.h>
32
33
34void *
35gomp_malloc (size_t size)
36{
37 void *ret = malloc (size);
38 if (ret == NULL)
39 gomp_fatal ("Out of memory allocating %lu bytes", (unsigned long) size);
40 return ret;
41}
42
43void *
44gomp_malloc_cleared (size_t size)
45{
46 void *ret = calloc (1, size);
47 if (ret == NULL)
48 gomp_fatal ("Out of memory allocating %lu bytes", (unsigned long) size);
49 return ret;
50}
51
52void *
53gomp_realloc (void *old, size_t size)
54{
55 void *ret = realloc (old, size);
56 if (ret == NULL)
57 gomp_fatal ("Out of memory allocating %lu bytes", (unsigned long) size);
58 return ret;
59}
60
